required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Arabin Pessary Use in Women at High Risk for Preterm Birth: 7 Years' Experience in a Single Tertiary Centre

brief_summary.textblock: This was a retrospective study sharing the experience of women high risk for spontaneous preterm birth managed by Arabin pessary.

detailed_description.textblock: The study recruitment was from 1st January 2013 until 31st December 2019. Inclusion criteria were previous mid-trimester miscarriage and/or preterm birth, previous cervical surgery or short cervical length on routine ultrasound. The primary outcome measure was birth before 34 weeks gestation.

primary_outcome.measure: Birth at or more than 34 weeks
primary_outcome.time_frame: From insertion of the Arabin pessary until birth of the foetus
primary_outcome.description: Gestation of birth in percentage that occurred at or more than 34 weeks gestation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From insertion of the Arabin pessary until birth of the foetus
secondary_outcome.description: Type of labour whether spontaneous or induced

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From onset of labour until birth of the foetus
secondary_outcome.description: Mode of delivery whether vaginal or caesarean section
Median neonatal birth weight in gram

secondary_outcome.measure: Admission into neonatal intensive care unit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At birth until discharged from the hospital
secondary_outcome.description: The need to admit the neonate to neonatal care intensive care unit at birth

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At insertion of the Arabin pessary
secondary_outcome.description: The mean cervical length at insertion of the Arabin pessary

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From insertion of Arabin pessary until birth of the foetus
secondary_outcome.description: The management of the patients after insertion of the Arabin pessary

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from insertion of Arabin pessary until birth of the foetus
secondary_outcome.description: Addition of progestogen therapy either vaginally or parenterally

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From insertion of Arabin pessary until birth of the foetus
secondary_outcome.description: Antenatal complications such as diabetes, hypertension and rupture of membranes

intervention.description: Arabin pessary was inserted intravaginally electively in women with cervical insufficiency (history based) or as emergency in those with short cervix on ultrasound.

study_pop.textblock: All women high risk for spontaneous preterm birth who were managed with Arabin pessary were included.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all women high risk for spontaneous preterm birth
Exclusion Criteria:
- had Arabin insertion elsewhere
- delivered elsewhere
- incomplete record
